Resolved Question Show me another » What's a good example and bad example of customer services you've given/received? I have an interview for a job as a catering assistant tomorrow, which will mainly include serving snacks over the counter to customers and a little bit of cooking. This question always trips me up because I can't think of anything that would stand out! I am currently a volunteer in a charity shop, so deal with customers there. Other Answers (3) Show: All Answers Oldest to Newest Newest to Oldest Rated Highest to Lowest by Erik Paul Member since: October 18, 2011 Total points: 842 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Good example is a customer ordered a package to arrive at our warehouse&it was estimated to be late since vendor couldn't fill order. Customer was upset about situation and I apologized sincerely to her relating to her issue. I offered her a replacement product we currently had if it was a time thing for the same price or I could ship it to their home free of charge if she wanted that item. After that she was really happy. Bad customer service, this lady at a fast food restaurant didnt charge my order correctly and when I courteously pointed it out to her, she said in Spanish to charge me for something that was close to the price and ended up charging me more for it. I knew what she said cause I live in SoCal and know the official state language down here. Okay, my girlfriend is a Spanish speaker. Edited 6 months ago Report Abuse 0% 0 Votes by Sam Jensen Member since: April 28, 2011 Total points: 488 (Level 2) Add Contact Block Well, my most memorable experience was over the internet. The best customer service I received from people who understand it best - CRM guys. I am using their system and I had a little trouble figuring out something so I contacted them and I received an answer in 30 minutes (bear in mind it was the middle of the night). They were fast and polite and helped me resolve the thing I was wondering about in a matter of minutes.
